doc:
Randy Stuart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Randy_Stuart 0 Randy Stuart, born as Elizabeth Shaubell (October 24, 1924 – July 20, 1996), was an American actress in film and television. A familiar face in several popular films of the 1940s and 1950s, and later in Western-themed television series, she is perhaps best remembered as Louise Carey, the wife of Scott Carey, played by Grant Williams, in The Incredible Shrinking Man (1957), a science-fiction classic named in 2009 as “culturally, historically or aesthetically” significant to be preserved for all time in the Library of Congress's National Film Registry. Randy_Stuart , born as Elizabeth_Shaubell ( October_24_,_1924 – July_20_,_1996 ) , was an_American_actress in film_and_television . A_familiar_face in several_popular_films of the_1940s_and_1950s , and later in Western-themed_television_series , she is_perhaps_best_remembered as Louise_Carey , the_wife of Scott_Carey , played by Grant_Williams , in The_Incredible_Shrinking_Man_(_1957_) , a_science-fiction_classic named in 2009 as “ culturally , historically_or_aesthetically ” significant to_be_preserved for all_time in the_Library of Congress 's_National_Film_Registry .
